content.value: Οι κάτοχοι αυτής της πιστοποίησης διαθέτουν πρακτική εμπειρία και ουσιαστική κατανόηση της επιχειρηματικότητας, έχοντας εργαστεί πάνω στη διαμόρφωση και αξιολόγηση startup ιδεών, την ανάπτυξη βιώσιμων business models, τη διερεύνηση product–market fit και τη δημιουργία ολοκληρωμένων pitch decks και Go-To-Market (GTM) στρατηγικών. Κατά τη διάρκεια του προγράμματος, συμμετείχαν σε ομαδικά projects, συνεργάστηκαν με mentors, founders και επενδυτές, και παρουσίασαν τις ιδέες τους σε πραγματικά επιχειρηματικά panels. Ανέπτυξαν δεξιότητες διαχείρισης κινδύνου, αβεβαιότητας και ταχεών αλλαγών, στοιχεία που χαρακτηρίζουν την startup κουλτούρα. Παράλληλα, καλλιέργησαν ικανότητες σε fundraising, startup storytelling, early-stage marketing και pitching, και είναι σε θέση να συνεισφέρουν ουσιαστικά είτε ως ιδρυτές, είτε ως βασικά στελέχη σε startup ή innovation-driven ομάδες. Η πιστοποίηση αυτή αποτελεί απόδειξη της επιχειρηματικής τους αντίληψης, της στρατηγικής τους σκέψης και της ικανότητάς τους να μετατρέπουν ιδέες σε πράξη.

content.value: Michael Tzamalis is an expert in lifelong learning, vocational education and training, and skilling development. He holds a Bachelor's degree in Political Science and Public Administration from the National and Kapodistrian University of Athens and a Master’s degree in Lifelong Learning from the Institute of Education, University of London.

He brings over 15 years of professional experience in the field. Since 2021, he has been serving as the Skilling Lead at Microsoft Greece, Cyprus, and Malta, where he leads national skilling and workforce development initiatives. He collaborates closely with government stakeholders, enterprises, academic institutions, and learning partners to enhance the skillsets of the current and future workforce. Previously, he dedicated nine years to the Small Enterprises’ Institute of the Hellenic Confederation of Professionals, Craftsmen and Merchants (IME GSEVEE), where he focused on the design, coordination, and management of vocational training programs for adult professionals and small business employees.

He also has extensive experience with European programs and partnerships with organizations across the EU. Additionally, he has collaborated on lifelong learning projects with the General Secretariat for Lifelong Learning (GSLLL) and the Youth and Lifelong Learning Foundation (INEDIVIM). He is passionate about empowering individuals through education and helping them unlock new career opportunities.

items.name: Michael Tzamalis
items.role: Skilling Lead | Driving Learning Culture Transformation & Growth

content.value: Nikos has expertise in developing strategies for Employer Branding, Talent Intelligence and Brand Communication at kariera.gr and has worked with some of the biggest employers in the country.

Nikos and his team provide tailored solutions for various components of employer brandinga and data-driven decision making, including employee value proposition building, career site optimization, onboarding & culture evaluation and candidate experience transformation.

Theo Vasileiadis is a serial entrepreneur with 20+ years of experience in technology, human capital, and innovation. He co-founded Kariera Group, a leading HR tech company in Southeastern Europe, and has launched over ten ventures across Europe and Asia.

Known for building high-performing teams and scaling businesses, Theo is also an educator, mentor, and author. He teaches Entrepreneurship at BCA / University of West London and speaks regularly on leadership and the future of work. A committed YPO member, he served on the Greek Chapter Board and is part of the YPO Presidents’ Program at Harvard Business School.

As a facilitator, Theo creates safe spaces for reflection and growth, blending empathy with momentum. He holds degrees in Economics & Finance and has completed executive programs at HBS and Singularity University.

Natasa has been active in the field of adult education for over a decade. Guided by her passion for people, it was only a matter of time before she found her place in Human Resources — even if it wasn't where her journey began.

She has gained experience both as an external vendor and as an in-house professional in major organizations, collaborating with many more along the way. Her career is defined by change — something she welcomes with enthusiasm, viewing each transition as a meaningful and exciting challenge.
Creative by nature, she brings fresh thinking and a hands-on mindset to every project she’s involved in—both within and beyond the workplace.

Mary started her career in the area of marketing but soon she was fascinated by Human Resources. She studied Business Administration and Psychology and during the last years she has been working for Hemmersbach, a German multinational company in the area of IT as HR Manager for Greece and as HR Business Partner for one of its spin-off companies.

Mary’s existence is intertwined with the concept of giving and social awareness, with strong voluntary and charitable action. As a long-distance runner, she is characterized by patience, perseverance and focus, and enjoys working on many different projects. Offering knowledge and experience is a process that motivates and inspires her and she will be happy to acquire mentees in the HR field, especially if they are also career change oriented, as she has been able to do.
At the same time, she feels that during this process, she will also become better through the interaction and exchange of views with other young professionals.

Learning Objectives of the Talent Acquisition & Recruiting Course: (i) Understand the fundamentals of Talent Acquisition & Recruiting, (ii) Develop effective Talent Sourcing & Recruiting strategies, (iii) Explore how AI tools like ChatGPT can enhance the recruitment process, (iv) Master interview processes and make informed hiring decisions, (v) Apply HR analytics and track key recruiting metrics, (vi) Integrate Diversity, Equity & Inclusion (DEI) principles into recruitment practices, and (vii) Design successful onboarding programs and improve employee retention. -Analyze future trends shaping the recruiting landscape. -Participate in a practical workshop and become familiar with key recruiting terminology.
This program is valid for 3 PDCs for SHRM-CP or SHRM-SCP recertification.

content.value: Michalis has over 10 years of accumulated knowledge working as a BI & Analytics professional and mentor in nine different roles, across seven different industries.
He has designed and developed analytical solutions in a wide variety of businesses, ranging from the banking sector and retailers to various tech companies.

His core interests lie in helping teams analyze their data and communicate insights effectively using stories.
He also mentors professionals who want to start or expand their analytical careers.
Efthimis Vafeiadis is the Co-Founder and Managing Director of Workearly, the leading upskilling and reskilling platform in Greece and one of the fastest-growing startups in Europe.

A graduate of the Computer Engineering and Informatics Department (CEID) at the University of Patras, Efthimis began his career as a Software Engineer from 2015 to 2019. In 2019, together with Dimitrios Kyriakatis, he co-founded Workearly, an AI-driven gamified EdTech platform. Starting without external funding, they managed to scale Workearly into the No.1 platform in Greece, supporting over 25,000 learners in their professional development.

Currently, Workearly offers the largest course catalog based on role-playing simulations and is the first platform in Greece to introduce Conversational AI technology in education through interactive role-playing experiences.
In June 2024, Workearly secured €1.1 million in funding, led by Metavallon VC, to further accelerate its growth and impact in the upskilling and reskilling landscape.

Konstantinos, now 42, grew up dreaming of becoming either a race car driver or a professional basketball player for Panathinaikos. However, his love for food led him down a different path - one that, by 2009, had brought his weight to over 170 kg. Through sheer determination and discipline, he managed to lose 90 kg, radically transforming his life.

Inspired by JFK’s famous quote - “Ask not what your country can do for you - ask what you can do for your country” - he dedicated 8 years of his 20-year career to ReGeneration, the largest education and employment initiative for young graduates in Greece. As a leading figure in the program, he helped facilitate the hiring of nearly 5,000 graduates across a network of 2,000 companies, while also delivering over 1,000,000 hours of training in soft, technical, and digital skills - reshaping the professional trajectory of an entire generation.His deep understanding of Generation Z, combined with his expertise in talent management and healthy corporate culture building, has made him a trusted reference point for organizations seeking to enhance the effectiveness and cohesion of their teams.

As a Business Mentor, he provides strategic guidance to leaders and executives, helping them develop essential skills such as communication, empathy, and people management, while also shaping pragmatic and balanced corporate culture frameworks.

As a Public Speaker, he blends solid knowledge with real-world experience to create fireside chats and powerful discussions that inspire, provoke thought, and foster live engagement with the audience.

With over 500 speaking engagements and collaborations with more than 250 companies, he has consistently worked to bridge the generational gap in the workplace - empowering organizations to see Generation Z not as a challenge, but as their greatest opportunity. This has established him as an authentic Gen Z Enabler, with a clear mission: to transform the work environment and strengthen the leadership potential of the next generation.

Since September 2022, he has also co-created and co-hosts Greece’s #1 Business Show, - Notify Show - a show that champions healthy workplace practices, confronts toxic behaviors, and builds meaningful bridges between the five generations currently coexisting in the professional arena. Through this platform, he continues to inspire change toward a more productive and human-centric workplace culture.

items.name: Konstantinos Kintzios
items.role: Business Mentor | Public Speaker | GenZ Enabler

content.value: Privacy Lawyer with a Master’s in International Law and a PhD candidacy in Competition and Privacy Law, with eight years of experience in privacy and regulatory compliance across various industries. Admitted to the Athens Bar Association, certified as a Certified Information Privacy Professional – Europe (CIPP/E) and a Data Protection Officer (TÜV Austria), with additional certifications in Whistleblowing Compliance (Workearly), COSO (IIA), and COSO ERM (IIA).

Passionate about data protection, corporate governance, whistleblowing, and ethics compliance. Actively engaged in legal research, with scientific publications on privacy and data protection. Committed to supporting professionals in enhancing their expertise and navigating challenges within corporate environments.

A lifelong analytics guy with 15 years of experience, now transitioning to a consultant for Generative AI solutions. Specializing in digital marketing use cases that drive tangible business value. Worked with global analytics teams in 3 continents, delivering end-to-end services & automations. Started as a data analyst, then moved into management before riding the AI wave since 2023. Studied Business in Thessaloniki and Technology at the London School of Economics. Lived and worked in 4 countries, collaborating with diverse teams. Passionate about AI, automation, and scaling data-driven decisions. Always eager to share knowledge and get inspired by others.

content.value: Nikos Varvadoukas is the VP of Brand, Omnichannel & Supply Chain at the Public Group, also serving as a Non-Executive Board Member and investor in dynamic startups (Convert Group, Findbar, SLEED, Box Now, Douleutaras, Simpler etc.). My name is Stefanos Prokos and I am the Co-Managing Partner of Synergetic, a business transformation consultancy helping companies turn their vision into action. With extensive experience in digital marketing, eCommerce, and strategy, I have led large-scale projects for multinational and Greek companies across various industries.

Previously, I was a Partner at EY Greece, leading the Digital Marketing and eCommerce Advisory team, and have also held leadership roles at Convert Group and other digital-focused organizations. Passionate about knowledge sharing, I have trained executives, served as an academic director, and co-founded innovative startups.

Experienced EU Projects & Proposals Manager with a demonstrated history of working in the ICT sector. He also has long experience of working in the wholesale and retail industry, automation and energy management. He is highly skilled in project management, research, scientific writing and instructing. He also speaks 4 languages and obtains a Master's degree focused on Biomaterials and Biomedical Engineering from University of Ioannina. He is a PhD Candidate at the Faculty of Medicine at University of Ioannina and has 4 research publications. As an EU Projects & Proposals Manager, is involved both in National and European projects. His R&D project record includes 2 Horizon Europe and 8 National granted projects, focused on producing innovation in a wide realm of expertise.

Danai Stavrou is an experienced project manager, lecturer, and consultant specializing in funded programs, education, and business development. With a strong background in EU-funded initiatives, she has successfully coordinated and managed national and international projects across various sectors, including education, entrepreneurship, and sustainability. As a university lecturer, she focuses on pedagogy, teaching methodologies, and professional skills development. Additionally, she provides consulting services for funding strategies and business growth. Her expertise in mentorship, training, and project implementation makes her a valuable contributor to professional development initiatives.

items.name: Danai Stavrou
items.role: EU Projects Manager - Education Specialist and Adult Trainer MEd

content.value: As a Career & Business Counselor and EU Project Manager, I specialize in mentoring professionals, entrepreneurs, and disadvantaged groups in career development, employability, and business strategy. With over a decade of experience in social and economic inclusion, I have successfully guided young professionals and underrepresented communities in navigating career choices, securing job placements, and transforming ideas into successful businesses. I provide practical coaching on personal branding, strategic career moves, and business growth, utilizing psychometric tools, the GROW methodology, and leadership techniques to empower individuals in achieving their professional goals. My hands-on, goal-oriented mentoring approach is tailored to diverse backgrounds, ensuring meaningful and sustainable career development.

items.name: Maria Mavridou
items.role: EU Project Manager | Career & Business Counsellor

content.value: Το Workearly είναι ο μοναδικός εγκεκριμένος πάροχος του HRCI σε Ελλάδα και Κύπρο, καθώς και ένας από τους ελάχιστους στην Ευρώπη. Αυτή η αναγνώριση διασφαλίζει την παροχή υψηλής ποιότητας εκπαιδευτικού υλικού για τα προγράμματα και τις πιστοποιήσεις HR, ενισχύοντας την αξιοπιστία και την αξία της επαγγελματικής κατάρτισης.

Irina Obushtarova is the co-founder of The Recursive, a media platform covering innovation in Central and Eastern Europe. She spent over a decade in Vienna, earning a degree in Journalism and Mass Communication from the University of Vienna and career experience in media, digital marketing and strategic communications.

In 2018, Irina returned to Bulgaria, inspired by the rapid growth of startup ecosystems in the region. Committed to increasing their global recognition, she co-founded The Recursive to showcase the region’s innovation potential. In 2020, she was recognized as a leading female entrepreneur by La French Tech, and in 2022, The Recursive was awarded “Agent of Change” by the Social Future Foundation.

As the CEO and co-founder of Pobuca, the customer experience company, I have been driving the vision, strategy, and growth of the business since 2016. With Pobuca Experience Cloud, we offer turn-key solutions to brands and retailers with software, consulting, and integration services leveraging Microsoft technologies. We help our clients measure, design, and improve customer experience and loyalty across digital channels and AI.

I have a passion for technology and innovation, and a background in Mechanical Engineering from the University of Patras. I have received the Microsoft Partner of the year award twice for Pobuca, and have spoken at many technology events and conferences. I also love rationalizing nature’s wonders and won the science communication contest of FameLab in 2011. My mission is to empower businesses to succeed in sales, marketing, and customer service by using cutting-edge technology and data-driven insights.

George brings into his career an extensive education background including a degree in Nuclear Physics, an MBA from Bentley University, and ongoing doctoral research as a PhD candidate at the Technical University of Crete. He has over 23 years of experience in leadership roles and as a COO, and has been successful in scaling and restructuring various organizations. George has grown teams to over a thousand and revenues from $500k to $1 billion within three years. His background also spans software development and project management, with roles at Cognizant, Wipro, Alite, Dentsu, and Mindshare. He has managed fiscal challenges, P&L responsibilities, and has led high-profile companies, such as Lloyd’s, BP, LBC, and Lego, in AI design and roadmapping.

Panos is a seasoned Growth Marketing professional and Co-Founder of Fussion, a performance-driven digital marketing agency helping ambitious brands scale beyond limits. With extensive experience across Performance Marketing, SEO, CRM, Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO), Inbound Marketing, and Web Analytics, he brings a strategic, data-driven approach to driving sustainable growth for startups, scaleups, and established businesses.

At Fussion, he leads client strategy and growth initiatives, delivering measurable results through tailored digital solutions. His passion for growth marketing is matched by a strong commitment to mentorship, team development, and building authentic, high-impact partnerships. Known for combining sharp analytical thinking with a creative mindset, he thrives on turning complex growth challenges into tangible business outcomes—while keeping collaboration enjoyable and purpose-driven.

Το Workearly είναι Industrial Partner στο DATAIA, το Ινστιτούτο Τεχνητής Νοημοσύνης και Ανάλυσης Δεδομένων του Πανεπιστημίου Paris-Saclay, το οποίο συγκαταλέγεται στα 60 καλύτερα πανεπιστήμια του κόσμου. Μέσα από αυτή τη συνεργασία, ερευνούμε νέες εφαρμογές AI και παρέχουμε υποστήριξη στο πανεπιστήμιο, διευκολύνοντας τη διασύνδεσή του με την αγορά εργασίας και ενισχύοντας την αξιοποίηση της τεχνολογίας στην πραγματική οικονομία.

Το Workearly είναι μέλος του Global Sports Innovation Center (GSIC), powered by Microsoft. Αυτή η συνεργασία μας δίνει τη δυνατότητα να αξιοποιήσουμε την τεχνογνωσία και τους πόρους ενός από τους κορυφαίους καινοτόμους οργανισμούς παγκοσμίως. Μέσω αυτής της στρατηγικής σύμπραξης, συμβάλλουμε στην εξέλιξη της αθλητικής βιομηχανίας, προωθώντας την καινοτομία και τη βιώσιμη ανάπτυξή της σε παγκόσμιο επίπεδο.

Το Workearly Greece σε συνεργασία με την Klarna κάνει την επένδυση στην εκπαίδευση προσιτή για όλους.Τώρα, οι έξυπνοι τρόποι πληρωμής με 3 άτοκες δόσεις μπορούν να χρησιμοποιηθούν για τις εκπαιδευτικές σας δαπάνες, διευκολύνοντας την πρόσβαση στη γνώση χωρίς οικονομικούς περιορισμούς.

Το Workearly είναι η πρώτη ελληνική πλατφόρμα που συνεργάστηκε με την Credly από το 2022.Η Credly είναι μια κορυφαία πλατφόρμα αναγνώρισης και πιστοποίησης δεξιοτήτων μέσω ψηφιακών διακριτικών (digital badges), επιτρέποντας στους επαγγελματίες να επιδεικνύουν επαληθευμένες δεξιότητες με αξιοπιστία.Μέσα από αυτή τη συνεργασία, το Workearly δίνει στους χρήστες τη δυνατότητα να πιστοποιούν τις δεξιότητές τους και να εντάσσονται σε μια παγκόσμια βάση δεδομένων με επαληθευμένα προφίλ και πιστοποιημένες ικανότητες, ενισχύοντας την αναγνωρισιμότητα και την επαγγελματική τους αξία

Το Workearly σε συνεργασία με την Opta - Stats Perform είναι η πρώτη ελληνική πλατφόρμα που εκπαιδεύει τους χρήστες στην ανάλυση δεδομένων με πραγματικά στατιστικά από το ποδόσφαιρο.Η Opta είναι παγκόσμιος ηγέτης στην ανάλυση αθλητικών δεδομένων, παρέχοντας στατιστικά και insights σε μεγάλους αθλητικούς οργανισμούς, ομάδες, προπονητές και μέσα ενημέρωσης. Με περισσότερα από 20 χρόνια εμπειρίας, η Opta αποτελεί την πιο αξιόπιστη πηγή δεδομένων στον χώρο του αθλητισμού.Αυτή η συνεργασία εγγυάται την καλύτερη μαθησιακή εμπειρία, μετατρέποντας την εκπαίδευση σε διαδραστικό παιχνίδι. Οι χρήστες μπορούν να μάθουν ανάλυση δεδομένων μέσα από την αγαπημένη τους ομάδα, κάνοντας τη διαδικασία πιο ενδιαφέρουσα και αποτελεσματική.

Celia is the Founder and Managing Director of GrantXpert Consulting. Her company specializes in providing consulting and training services in relation to EU funding programmes, having secured over 50 million euros in funding since 2009.

From 2005 until 2000 she worked as a Visiting Lecturer at local Business Schools (EUC, CIIM, CIM), on entrepreneurship development, professional career development and strategy.

Celia is an accredited HRDA trainer and she conducts interactive courses on topics like “Accessing EU and National Funding,” “Boosting Leadership, Employability and Entrepreneurial Skills” and “Developing and Promoting Managers into Effective Leaders”.

Furthermore, she is the Administrative Director at the Future Skills Hub of the European University Cyprus. Celia received the Madame Figaro “Businesswoman of the Year Award” in 2018. Since is also recognised as one of LinkedIn's Top Voices in Leadership Development.

Hey, I'm Stavros! I am driven by the challenge of scaling businesses through a potent combination of strategic digital acquisition channels (performance marketing, digital marketing, growth hacking, SEO), cutting-edge Martech expertise (CRO, A/B testing, digital transformation), and data-driven insights (business intelligence, data analytics, AI). My drive has been instrumental in achieving sustainable growth and profitability, including playing a key role in one of the Greek Sports Fashion industry's most successful acquisitions.

Vassilis Magklaras is a digital marketing expert, growth strategist, and startup mentor with over a decade of experience. As Co-founder and Managing Director of Fussion, a performance-driven agency, he has successfully led 300+ projects, driving growth, organic traffic, and conversion optimization for businesses across various industries.

Beyond his executive role, Vassilis is deeply involved in mentoring startups in Greece and internationally, guiding founders on scaling strategies, customer acquisition, and market expansion. He has worked with businesses of all sizes—from early-stage startups to established brands—helping them navigate digital transformation and stay ahead in competitive markets.
He holds a Master’s in Marketing & Social Media and has earned multiple industry awards and certifications in growth marketing, SEO, performance optimization, and analytics
Dimitris Kyriakatis is the Co-Founder and Managing Director of Workearly, the leading upskilling and reskilling platform in Greece and one of the fastest-growing startups in Europe.

A graduate of the Computer Engineering and Informatics Department (CEID) at the University of Patras, Dimitris began his career as a Software Engineer from 2014 to 2019. In 2019, together with Efthymios Vafeiadis, he co-founded Workearly, an AI-driven gamified EdTech platform. Starting without external funding, they managed to scale Workearly into the No.1 platform in Greece, supporting over 25,000 learners in their professional development.

Currently, Workearly offers the largest course catalog based on role-playing simulations and is the first platform in Greece to introduce Conversational AI technology in education through interactive role-playing experiences.
In June 2024, Workearly secured €1.1 million in funding, led by Metavallon VC, to further accelerate its growth and impact in the upskilling and reskilling landscape.

I am a +20 years student of Marketing, Sales & Business Development, working in very different and diversified environments, from Start ups to 1000+ People companies and from Self Employment and Small/Mendium ones. My experience is all about challenging projects and positions that helped me realize that management and leadership are all about understanding people first and organizations later.

Yorgos Kleivokiotis is an entrepreneurial and results-driven executive with a strong track record in marketing, customer experience, and business development. He has held leadership roles across various industries, from tech startups to large-scale enterprises, specializing in growth strategies, organizational transformation, and customer experience innovation.

Most recently, he led global marketing and client experience efforts at Blueground, overseeing branding, performance marketing, and customer engagement across 33 cities and 19 countries. He supports Workearly on topics of Marketing strategy and business development.

Yorgos has lived and worked in Dubai, Athens, São Paulo, New York City, Copenhagen, and other global hubs, gaining a deep cross-cultural perspective. An INSEAD MBA graduate, he is fluent in Greek and English and is currently learning Portuguese. He is passionate about technology, education, and customer-centric innovation.

content.value:
George is a Partner at Metavallon, which currently manages 2 VC funds with over €55 million in total AUM. Metavallon specializes in funding early stage businesses at the forefront of technological innovation. It has received investments from the EIF, the HDBI, as well as from distinguished institutional and private investors.

He holds a B.Sc. degree in Environmental Sciences from the University of Athens, an M.Sc. degree in Geophysics from the University of Leeds, and an MBA from ALBA. He worked for several years as a business consultant and has supported many Greek SMEs in securing funding by leveraging relevant Greek and European tools. Later, he worked as an executive in leading Greek companies in the ICT sector. He has experience from startups to companies listed on various Stock Exchanges like Athens, London AIM and Nasdaq.

Demetris Stefani is a seasoned marketer and brand strategist, specializing in positioning and performance marketing. With a background in digital marketing and agency leadership, he founded Hivebreed Ltd, a consultancy helping businesses take their next step through strategic marketing, brand transformation, and fractional marketing management. Previously, he served as Head of Marketing at Foody (Delivery Hero), leading its rapid expansion in Cyprus.

Demetris believes that strong brands drive sustainable business growth. His expertise spans from performance-driven campaigns to brand-led growth strategies, ensuring companies maximize their market potential.

I’m Lefteris, a Solutions Architect at AWS and the author of the book “Mastering Event-Driven Microservices in AWS”. I have over 15 years of experience in Software Engineering and I specialize in Cloud, Serverless computing, Microservices, Event-Driven Architectures, and Java.

I’m passionate about sharing my knowledge and expertise through various channels. I frequently speak at technical conferences (AWS re:Invent, AWS Summits, Devoxx), discussing topics like Serverless, Event-Driven Microservices, and Java. I’ve also contributed as a Technical Author for Java Code Geeks, one of the most popular blogs for Java Programmers.

Throughout my career, I’ve successfully led the migration of large monolithic systems to event-driven microservices architectures. In 2019, I Co-Founded a startup where I built the entire platform with Serverless on AWS and the MVP in less than 3 months with zero development cost. I’ve also trained over 200 individuals on the AWS cloud platform as an AWS Tech Instructor.

Hey there! I’m a digital marketing enthusiast with almost a decade of experience in the field. I studied Management Science and Technology at the Athens University of Economics and Business, and since then, I’ve been diving deep into the world of performance marketing, Data, and MarTech.

Currently, I’m part of the Public Group team as a Performance Marketing Manager, where I play around (responsibly!) with paid media, analytics, and all things data-driven. I love staying ahead of digital trends, optimizing campaigns, and turning insights into results. Whether it's cracking the code of an ad strategy or geeking out over new marketing tech, I’m always up for the challenge!

Myrto Papathanou is a Founding Partner at Metavallon VC, a venture capital funding early-stage technology companies in Greece since 2018, with > € 50m AUM currently investing out of Fund II. She has over 20 years of experience in the fields of investment, finance and entrepreneurship.

Myrto started her career in London, working as a credit risk analyst for Dresdner Kleinwort Wasserstein and later as a Fixed Income Strategist for Bank of America Merrill Lynch. Returning to Greece, she was involved in technology and high-tech companies as an operator and executive. Before co-founding Metavallon VC, she was Group CFO and Head of Corporate Development in EFA Ventures, a group active Aerospace&Defense and hightech verticals. For Metavallon VC, Myrto has led the investments in Think Silicon (acquired by Applied Materials), Better Origin, Ferryhopper and Advantis amongst others. She also currently serves as an independent Non-Executive Director at Thrace Group (ASE: PLAT) and Action Finance Initiative SA.

Earners of this certification have a complete understanding of the Data Scientist's role and skills and they are able to conduct Data Analysis, Reporting and Data Visualisation operations . They demonstrated fluency and advanced knowledge in fields like programming with Python for Data Analysis, Databases - SQL, and reporting tools. Badge owners are able to use successfully the Data Scientist's tools and practices.
